page.title: 04Hobbies and Pastimes
page.content: After school we have a lot of time to occupy. Some of the children in our primary school fill their time like this:- Fishing ****** Cacti * Reading ******************* Swimming ********************** Netball ****** Music ********* Drawing *************** Gymnastics ** Cycling ******************* Tennis ************** Football ********* Snooker ********** Squash ****** Cricket ********** Photography ****** Badminton ******* Table Tennis *************** plus others too many to mention.
